title: The effect of comorbidities on diagnostic interval for lung cancer in England: a cohort study using electronic health record data.
details: I Rogers, M Cooper, A Memon, LJL Forbes… - British Journal of Cancer, 2024
abstract: Background: Comorbid conditions may delay lung cancer diagnosis by placing demand on clinician's time reducing the possibility of prompt cancer investigation (“competing demand conditions”), or by offering a plausible non-cancer explanation …
